{{Location Intro|The '''Tsurumi Underground Ruins'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Tsurumi Underground Ruins|It|The Tsurumi Underground Ruins}} connects between [[Shirikoro Peak]] and [[Chirai Shrine]]; the Shirikoro Peak entrance is at the base of the mountain under the [[Perch]], while Chirai Shrine's entrance is located underneath the ruins. The underground ruins contain remnants of both the [[Thunderbird Civilization]] and an even earlier civilization.</p>}}

==Puzzles==
===Ruins Torch Puzzles===
There are three Ruins Torch puzzles in the underground ruins. Solving all three requires the [[Peculiar Pinion (Gadget)]] obtained from Step 3 in the {{Quest|Octave of the Maushiro}}, and is a prerequisite for the {{Achievement|Guessing Game}}. The puzzles' solutions are indicated by the filled-in stars on a corresponding nearby mural.

==Lore==
Long ago, a unified human civilization existed throughout [[Teyvat]], including Tsurumi Island. This civilization left behind murals, which can be found throughout the underground ruins.
